preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh each ingredient accurately. 
 2. In a clean mixing bowl, combine 100 g of B with 200 g of 3-P. 
 3. Gradually add 150 g of m while stirring continuously to ensure even distribution. 
 4. Finally, incorporate 50 g of Zn and mix thoroughly until homogeneous.
